languages.text: {n}Прищурившись, Соломон внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Это так. И чем же вам хочется заниматься после боя?"
{n}His eyes narrowing, Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "I would. And what do you like doing after a battle?"
languages.original_text: {n}Прищурившись, Соломон внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Это так. И чем же вам хочется заниматься после боя?"

traits.locale_text: {n}His eyes narrowing, Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "I would. And what do you like doing after a battle?"
{n}His eyes narrowing, Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "I would. And what do you like doing after a battle?"
{n}His eyes narrowing, Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "I would. And what do you like doing after a battle?"
{n}His eyes narrowing, Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "I would. And what do you like doing after a battle?"
{n}His eyes narrowing, Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "I would. And what do you like doing after a battle?"

languages.text: {n}Solomorne vous lance un regard intense, les yeux plissés.{/n} « En effet. Et que préférez-vous donc faire après un combat ? »
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes narrowing, Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "I would. And what do you like doing after a battle?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne vous lance un regard intense, les yeux plissés.{/n} « En effet. Et que préférez-vous donc faire après un combat ? »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは目を細めて、じっとあなたを見つめた。{/n}「そうですね。それであなたは戦闘の後、何をするのがお好きなんですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes narrowing, Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "I would. And what do you like doing after a battle?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは目を細めて、じっとあなたを見つめた。{/n}「そうですね。それであなたは戦闘の後、何をするのがお好きなんですか？」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne entrecierra los ojos y clava su mirada en ti.{/n} «Verdad, sí. ¿Qué prefiere usted hacer después de una batalla?».
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes narrowing, Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "I would. And what do you like doing after a battle?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne entrecierra los ojos y clava su mirada en ti.{/n} «Verdad, sí. ¿Qué prefiere usted hacer después de una batalla?».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙眯起眼睛，专注地盯着你。{/n}“我同意。战斗结束之后，你都喜欢做些什么？”
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes narrowing, Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "I would. And what do you like doing after a battle?"

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙眯起眼睛，专注地盯着你。{/n}“我同意。战斗结束之后，你都喜欢做些什么？”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, gözlerini kısarak seni süzüyor.{/n} "Doğru. Sizin canınız ne çekiyor mesela?"
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes narrowing, Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "I would. And what do you like doing after a battle?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, gözlerini kısarak seni süzüyor.{/n} "Doğru. Sizin canınız ne çekiyor mesela?"

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Augen verengen sich zu Schlitzen und er mustert dich angespannt.{/n} "Doch. Was macht Ihr denn gerne nach einer Schlacht?"
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes narrowing, Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "I would. And what do you like doing after a battle?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Augen verengen sich zu Schlitzen und er mustert dich angespannt.{/n} "Doch. Was macht Ihr denn gerne nach einer Schlacht?"
